pullrequest.title: SVG support for arcs, disjoints paths and their triangulation / extrusion

content.raw:
There are a few returns due to errors in this function, but even if you get an error, the mesh is generated. This is the case for file `toExtrude18.svg` on issue #1630: Error `[Err] [MeshManager.cc:623] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed` gets printed, but mesh->visual->link are still generated.

I think there should be a way to return an error and prevent mesh generation if this function returns before the mesh is completed. Maybe moving line 520 to the end of this function is a start? I tried doing it but then Gazebo crashes, I guess this must be fixed all the way to the model editor?
content.html:
There are a few returns due to errors in this function, but even if you get an error, the mesh is generated. This is the case for file toExtrude18.svg on issue #1630: Error [Err] [MeshManager.cc:623] Unable to extrude mesh. Triangulation failed gets printed, but mesh->visual->link are still generated.

I think there should be a way to return an error and prevent mesh generation if this function returns before the mesh is completed. Maybe moving line 520 to the end of this function is a start? I tried doing it but then Gazebo crashes, I guess this must be fixed all the way to the model editor?
